original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṁ gacchantassa antarāmagge eḷakalomāni uppajjiṁsu.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno kosalesu janapade sāvatthim gacchantassa antarāmagge eḷaka lomāni

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāni eḷakalomāni uttarāsaṅgena bhaṇḍikaṁ bandhitvā agamāsi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu tāni eḷaka lomāni uttarāsaṅgena bhaṇḍikam bandhitvā agamāsi

original: So bhikkhu tehi manussehi uppaṇḍiyamāno maṅku ahosi.
analyzed: saḥ bhikkhu tehi manussehi uppaṇḍiyamānaḥ maṅku ahosi

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu sāvatthiṁ gantvā tāni eḷakalomāni ṭhitakova āsumbhi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu sāvatthim gantvā tāni eḷaka lomāni

original: “kissa tvaṁ, āvuso, imāni eḷakalomāni ṭhitakova āsumbhasī”ti?
analyzed: kissa tvaḥ āvuso imāni eḷaka lomāni āsumbhasi iti

original: “Tathā hi panāhaṁ, āvuso, imesaṁ eḷakalomānaṁ kāraṇā manussehi uppaṇḍito”ti.
analyzed: tathā hi pana āha āvuso imesam eḷaka lomānam kāraṇā manussehi uppaṇḍito ti

original: “Kīva dūrato pana tvaṁ, āvuso, imāni eḷakalomāni āharī”ti?
analyzed: kīva dūratas pana tvaḥ āvuso imāni eḷaka lomāni āhari iti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma bhikkhu atirekati yojanam eḷaka lomāni āharissati iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū taṁ bhikkhuṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū tam bhikkhum aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, bhikkhu, atirekatiyojanaṁ eḷakalomāni āharī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tva bhikkhu atireka tiyojanam eḷaka lomāni āhari iti

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, atirekatiyojanaṁ eḷakalomāni āharissasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa atireka tiyojanam eḷaka lomāni āharissasi
na itam moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Bhikkhuno paneva addhānamaggappaṭipannassa eḷakalomāni uppajjeyyuṁ. Ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbāni.
analyzed: bhikkhuno pana iva addhāna magga ppaṭipannassa eḷaka lomāni uppajjeyyu ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbāni

original: Paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaparamaṁ sahatthā haritabbāni, asante hārake.
analyzed: paṭiggahetvā ti yojana paramam sahatthā haritabbāni asante hārake

original: Tato ce uttari hareyya, asantepi hārake, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: tatas ce uttari hareyya a sante pi hārake nissaggiyam pācittiyanti
bhikkhuno pana iva addhāna magga ppaṭipannassa ati

original: uppajjeyyuṁ saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā paṁsukūlaṁ vā attano vā dhanena.
analyzed: uppajjeyyum saṅghataḥ vā gaṇataḥ vā ñātitaḥ vā mittataḥ vā pasu kūlam vā attanaḥ vā dhanena
paṭiggahetvā ti yojana paramam sahatthā haritabbāni iti

original: nāñño koci hārako hoti itthī vā puriso vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā.
analyzed: na aññaḥ koci hārakaḥ hoti itthī vā purisaḥ vā gahaṭṭhaḥ vā pabbajitaḥ vā

original: Tato ce uttari hareyya, asantepi hāraketi
analyzed: tato ce uttari hareyya asante pi hāraka iti

original: paṭhamaṁ pādaṁ tiyojanaṁ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: paṭhamam pādam ti yojanam atikkāmeti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Antotiyojane ṭhito bahitiyojanaṁ pāteti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
Aññassa yāne vā bhaṇḍe vā ajānantassa pakkhipitvā tiyojanaṁ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyāni honti.
analyzed: aññassa yāne vā bhaṇḍe vā a jānantassa pakkhipitvā ti yojanam atikkāmeti nissaggiyāni honti

original: Nissajjitabbāni saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
analyzed: nissajjitabbāni saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā

original: “imāni me, bhante, eḷakalomāni tiyojanaṁ atikkāmitāni nissaggiyāni.
analyzed: imāni me bhante eḷaka lomāni ti yojanam atikkāmitāni nissaggiyāni
imān ā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi iti pe
atireka tiyojane atireka saññī atikkāmeti nissaggiyam pācittiya
atirekati yojane vematikaḥ atikkāmeti nissaggiyam pācittiya
atireka tiyojane ūnaka saññī atikkāmā iti nissaggiyam pācittiya
ūnakati yojane atireka saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: tiyojanaṁ vāsādhippāyo gantvā tato paraṁ harati,
analyzed: ti yojanam vāsa adhippāyaḥ gantvā tatas param harati
